page.title: 18Clive C of E Primary School
page.content: Clive School has one classroom for the infants and one for the Juniors There are {two teachers and 42 children}. The school starts at {9am} and pupils arrive from 8.45.am. Some come by car, others walk. The school is sited on the side of Grinshill, so the children have to walk up the hill. Breaktimes last for 15 mins. when they play games such as 'cops and robbers'. Dinner time lasts for 1 hour 10 mins. The school arranges lunches if required.The children have mainly{ {Maths and English }lessons which they enjoy. The children do not have P.E. but are taught basic games and ball skills. When they leave Clive, the children will go to the Adams School, Wem. The school is built out of Grinshill sandstone which was quarried locally. School ends at {3.30 pm.}
